# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String, text_width::Int=10)
    words = split(str)
    lines = String[]
    line = ""

    for word in words
        if length(line) + length(word) <= text_width
            line *= " " * word
        else
            push!(lines, line[2:end])  # don't keep the leading space of the line
            line = word
        end
    end
    
    if !isempty(line)
        push!(lines, line)
    end

    return join(lines, "\n")
end

# Example usage:
str = "This function will wrap words into lines"
println(wrap_string(str))
```
